Source.HTML Code: Home Over Agenda Nieuws

Jouw profiel
&P1_HIDDEN_COUNT_DAYS. Days to go

Welkom &P1_HIDDEN_FIRST_NAME.!

Op deze applicatie krijg je een overzicht te zien van jouw agenda, medewerkers, ...
Onderaan de pagina heb je een overzicht van test knoppen, waaronder, jouw profiel, jouw persoonlijke progressie, het aantal dagen tot je start!

Source.SQL Query:
select
id, dbms_lob.getlength(profile_picture) as profile_picture, mimetype, filename,created_date_pic
from cf_starters
where token = :APP_USER;

Pagination.Type: Row Ranges X to Y (with next and previous links)

Source.SQL Query:
select count(*)
from cf_starters_notifications_pwa
join cf_starters on cf_starters.id = starter_id
where cf_starters.token = :APP_USER and seen = 0;

Source.SQL Query:
select c.name
from cf_starters s
join cf_companies c on company_id = c.id
where s.token = :APP_USER;

Source.SQL Query:
select count(ts.id)
from cf_starters s
join cf_todos_starters ts on s.id = ts.starter_id
where token = :APP_USER and ts.checked = 1;

Source.PL\/SQL Code:
DECLARE
    l_company_name varchar2(50 CHAR);
    l_company_id number;
    l_current_theme_number number;
    l_theme_style_id       number;
    l_new_theme_style_id   number;

BEGIN

    /*SELECT THE STARTERS COMPANY*/

    select cf_companies.name, cf_companies.id
    into l_company_name, l_company_id
    from cf_starters
    join cf_companies on cf_companies.id = company_id
    where token = :APP_USER;

    /*SELECT THEME ID*/

    select theme_number 
    into l_current_theme_number 
    from apex_application_themes 
    where application_id = :app_id 
    and ui_type_name   = 'DESKTOP' 
    and is_current = 'Yes';  
 
    /*DEPENDING ON COMPANY SELECT STYLE ID*/
    if l_company_name = 'FieldSide' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name = 'FieldSide';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Contribute' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'Contribute';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Bryxx' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'BRYXX';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Zebanza' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'Zebanza';
    elsif l_company_name = 'RKITEK' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'RKITEK';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Craftcode' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'CraftCode';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Diferenco' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'DIFERENCO';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Droppar' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'Droppar';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Equalminds' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'Equalminds';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Tripwire Solutions' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'Tripwire Solutions';
    elsif l_company_name = 'Exitas' then
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name= 'Exitas';
    else
        select s.theme_style_id 
        into l_new_theme_style_id 
        from apex_application_theme_styles s
        where s.application_id = :APP_ID
        and s.name = 'FieldSide';
    end if;
 
        APEX_THEME.SET_USER_STYLE( 
            p_application_id => 131,
            p_user           => :APP_USER,
            p_theme_number   =>l_current_theme_number,
            p_id             => l_new_theme_style_id 
           );
END;
